::Spears::

She laughed. "I just got my feet back on hard soil and plan to keep 
them there for a while. You can take off and I'll catch up if you 
want. But I'm walking." She started walking towards the base. 
"Oh, by the way, nice shooting, but I don't think the chairs are 
going to attack." she laughs."But thanks." she smiled.

She knew why he shot the arms off the chair.  She was glad to have 
friends again. Real friends. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker looks from Spears to the indents her fingers had left on 
the seat. He 
> chuckles.
> 
> "Don't worry about it, we all have our fears," he says, looking at 
the seat. 
> He takes out a pistol, shooting the arms off of the chair.
> 
> "There, now no one will find out," he says, putting the pistol 
away, "Let's 
> go."
> 
> He starts to walk, and stops when an idea occurs to him. "It would 
be faster 
> if I fly you there, but I think you would prefer to walk?"
